title: Remove older placeholder portfolio video embed

requirements.summary: Remove the legacy placeholder YouTube embed from the Portfolio data so only the user-provided video links remain visible/playable in the grid and preview dialog.
acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/src/components/portfolio/portfolioData.ts` no longer contains the video embed URL `https://www.youtube.com/embed/dQw4w9WgXcQ`.
The Portfolio grid and preview dialog no longer show/play any video other than the user-provided links already added to the portfolio (YouTube Shorts/Instagram Reel URLs previously provided).
No changes are required to backend canisters; the update is implemented entirely in the frontend data/content.

file_operations.description: Remove the portfolio item (or at minimum its `media.video.url`) that contains the legacy placeholder embed URL `https://www.youtube.com/embed/dQw4w9WgXcQ`, ensuring it cannot appear in the Portfolio grid or be opened/played in `PortfolioPreviewDialog` while keeping existing categories and UI behavior unchanged.
